title: cant open launcher says cant connect to HTTP server
body: every time to go to open league it just come us with an error saying that it cant connect to HTTP server. Check you are connected to the internet and that the firewall is not blocking access. I am connected to the internet and when i go and check my firewall I cant find league at all.

replies.body: It seems that your network is failing to establish a connection to the server, but we can troubleshoot to get this fixed up!  You can actually download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help by automatically configuring your firewall settings to allow access.  I also suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is in good shape.  Let me know if you have any questions!
